pageProduct.name: Antipodes Juliet Skin Brighten Gel Cleanser 200ml
pageProduct.description:
General Information

Achieve clean, clear and blemish-free skin thanks to the action of exfoliating extracts from the New Zealand superfruit kiwi and vibrant hibiscus bloom. Antibacterial manuka honey and antioxidant Vinanza Grape & Kiwi form the perfect union to help reduce and balance your skin’s oil production.
Elements of Beauty: Kiwi seed oil * Manuka honey * Vinanza Grape & Kiwi
Pure Plant Fragrance: Green apple & cardamon

e200ml / 6.7fl oz

Warnings

EXTERNAL APPLICATION ONLY. PATCH TEST PRIOR TO USE. IN UNLIKELY EVENT OF NEGATIVE REACTION DISCONTINUE USE AND CONSULT HEALTH PRACTITIONER. RECYCLABLE GLASS. HANDLE WITH CARE. STORE IN COOL DARK PLACE BELOW 21°C. COLOUR AND CLARITY MAY VARY BETWEEN PRODUCTS DUE TO PURE NATURAL CONTENT. GOLD FLAKES MAY DISSOLVE AND ARE NOT ALWAYS VISIBLE. LOVE NATURE

Common Uses

SKINCARE

Ingredients

Aqua (water), sodium cocoamphoacetate, glycerin, lauryl glucoside, sodium cocoyl glutamate, sodium lauryl glucose carboxylate - Plantapon SF®, caprylyl/capryl glucoside, coco-glucoside & glyceryl oleate, xantham gum, sclerotium gum (Amigel®), Anthemis nobilis (chamomile) extract, decyl glucoside, Persea gratissima (avocado) oil, Simmondsia chinensis (jojoba) seed oil, Phormium tenax (harakeke) seed oil, Hibiscus sabdariffa (hibiscus flower) extract, Vitis vinifera (Vinanza Oxifend® pinot noir grape skin) extract, Vinanza® Grape & Kiwi (Vitis vinifera (Vinanza® Grape grape seed) extract & Actinisis chinensis (kiwifruit seed) extract), Leptospermum scoparium mel (manuka honey), Camellia sinensis (green tea) extract, sodium citrate, Ribes nigrum (blackcurrant seed) oil, sodium benzoate, potassium sorbate, gluconolactone, sodium benzoate, essential oil fragrances of green apple & cardamon: benzyl alcohol†, cinnamal†, citral†, citronellol†, geraniol†, d-Limonene†, linalool†.

     † Component of essential oil

Directions

Dampen the skin of your face and neck, and then massage the gel into your skin using upward strokes. Give extra care to blemishes. Use morning and night before your favourite Antipodes toner, serum and moisturiser. Suited to most skin types, especially oily.
